content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions or favorites, but here are some popular songs from each band that are often cited as fan favorites:

1) Yes - "Roundabout," "Close to the Edge," "Owner of a Lonely Heart," "Heart of the Sunrise." 2) Genesis - "Supper's Ready," "The Musical Box," "Dancing with the Moonlit Knight," "Firth of Fifth." 3) King Crimson - "21st Century Schizoid Man," "Epitaph," "Starless," "In the Court of the Crimson King." 4) Gentle Giant - "Playing the Game," "The Advent of Panurge," "Just the Same," "On Reflection." 5) Pink Floyd - "Comfortably Numb," "Wish You Were Here," "Shine On You Crazy Diamond," "Another Brick in the Wall." I hope you enjoy listening to these songs, and let me know if you have any further questions or recommendations!
